title: 3 Easy Ways to Stream Fox Nation on Your TV

steps.title: Download the Fox Nation app on your TV.
steps.content: Download the Fox Nation app on your TV. Most smart TVs have an app store that allows you to download apps to your TV. Press the Home button on your TV remote, go to the Apps section, and search for "Fox Nation." Select it from the search results, then select the option to install it on your TV. Make sure your smart TV is connected to the internet . Fox Nation is available on most smart TVs, including Roku TV, VIZIO SmartCast, Samsung Tizen, Android TV, and LG Smart TV. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Open the Fox Nation app and sign in.
steps.content: Open the Fox Nation app and sign in. Once you download and install the Fox Nation app, select the Fox Nation app from the Apps section of your smart TV's home screen and log in. There are two ways to sign in to Fox Nation: If you have subscribed using your email, select Sign in with Email and sign in using the email address and password you used to set up your Fox Nation account. Alternatively, you can sign in with your TV provider. To do so, select Sign in with TV Provider , then select your provider and follow the instructions to sign in. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Start watching Fox Nation on your TV.
steps.content: Start watching Fox Nation on your TV. Once you find something you want to watch, select the option to play the program. Once the program loads, it will play on your TV. You can use your TV remote to control the playback, including stop, rewind, and fast-forward.

steps.title: Connect a streaming device or box to your TV.
steps.content: Connect a streaming device or box to your TV. If Fox Nation isn't available for your smart TV, you can connect a streaming device like a Roku stick, Amazon Fire TV Stick, Chromecast with Google TV, Android TV Box, Apple TV, or even a console like Xbox, and install the Fox Nation app. Most streaming devices connect to an HDMI port on the back of your TV. You'll also need to plug the device's power cable into an available power outlet or a powered USB port on your TV.

steps.title: Power on your TV and switch to the streaming box source.
steps.content: Power on your TV and switch to the streaming box source. Once the streaming box is connected, power on your TV and press the Source button on your remote to switch to the input source corresponding to the HDMI port to which you connected your streaming box. The first time you set up your streaming device, you'll need to go through a quick setup process. Some Google Chromecast devices need a mobile phone to set up. For these devices, you can set them up using the Google Home app on your mobile phone.

steps.title: Connect your mobile device and smart TV or streaming box to Wi-Fi.
steps.content: Connect your mobile device and smart TV or streaming box to Wi-Fi. Both your smartphone or tablet, and your smart TV or streaming box must be connected to the same Wi-Fi network to be able to cast from your mobile phone to your TV. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Download the Fox Nation app onto your mobile device.
steps.content: Download the Fox Nation app onto your mobile device. You can download Fox Nation on Android from the Google Play Store. You can download it from the App Store for iPhone and iPad. Open one of these apps and use the search feature to search “Fox Nation.” Tap the app and then tap Install or GET . You may also need to have the Fox Nation app downloaded to your smart TV or streaming device .

steps.title: Open the Fox Nation app on your mobile device and sign in.
steps.content: Open the Fox Nation app on your mobile device and sign in. There are two ways to sign in to Fox Nation: If you have subscribed using your email, tap Sign in with Email and enter your login details. Alternatively, if you subscribe to a TV service that offers Fox Nation, tap Sign In with TV Provider , select your television provider, and sign in.

steps.title: Start playing a program you want to watch.
steps.content: Start playing a program you want to watch. Tap the play button to start playing the program on your mobile device.

steps.title: Tap the cast icon .
steps.content: Tap the cast icon . The icon resembles a TV screen with a Wi-Fi icon over it. It’s generally in the upper-right corner of the playback window.

steps.title: Select your TV or streaming device.
steps.content: Select your TV or streaming device. All devices you can connect to should be listed below “Connect to” at the bottom of the screen. Once you tap your TV or streaming device, the program you're watching on your phone will start playing on your TV. You can use your mobile device to control the playback controls. Use your phone to stop, pause, skip, or fast-forward through the show.
